workflow.name: Analyze high-priority tenders from Airtable to Slack for Go/No-Go approval
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Streamline management decision-making by automatically evaluating high-priority tenders, generating AI-powered executive summaries, and routing them for approval inside Slack. ü§ñüì© This workflow pulls pending tenders from Airtable, uses GPT-4o-mini to evaluate urgency, business opportunity, and risk, and generates a structured summary with a Go/No-Go recommendation. Tenders that qualify are pushed to Slack with interactive approval buttons, and the final decision instantly updates Airtable and triggers a confirmation email to your bid team. Perfect for fast-moving procurement, bidding, and sales teams that require structured, high-quality tender assessments. üìä‚ö°

## üîÅ What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Runs daily via Schedule Trigger to fetch high-priority pending tenders from Airtable. ‚è∞
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Sends each tender to the AI agent for evaluation (urgency, risk, opportunity). ü§ñ
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Generates structured JSON output:
 ‚Äî urgency
 ‚Äî priorityScore
 ‚Äî executive summary
 ‚Äî Go/No-Go recommendation
 ‚Äî reasoning
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Formats AI output for Slack review and Airtable updates. üìù
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Checks if tender qualifies as ‚ÄúHigh urgency + High score + Go.‚Äù üö¶
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Sends interactive Slack message with Approve/Reject buttons. üí¨
 7Ô∏è‚É£ If approved ‚Üí updates Airtable status to Approved and sends Gmail confirmation. üìß
 8Ô∏è‚É£ If rejected or low-score ‚Üí updates Airtable status accordingly. ‚úèÔ∏è
 9Ô∏è‚É£ If no priority tenders exist ‚Üí sends fallback Slack notification. üì≠

## ‚≠ê Key Benefits
‚úÖ Eliminates manual tender review and scoring
 ‚úÖ AI creates consistent, executive-ready summaries
 ‚úÖ Fast approval flow inside Slack with built-in decision logging
 ‚úÖ Clear Go/No-Go framework for quality tender selection
 ‚úÖ Updates Airtable automatically with final decision
 ‚úÖ Sends email confirmation for approved tenders ‚Äî ensuring next steps start immediately

## üß© Features
Daily Airtable lookup for high-priority tenders
GPT-4o-mini AI scoring & structured evaluation
Automatic Go/No-Go decision logic
Slack interactive approval (Approve / Reject)
Auto-update to Airtable (Status = Approved / Pending)
Gmail confirmation email to the bid team
JSON output parser for reliable AI formatting
Tender link embedding for quick access

## üîê Requirements
Airtable Personal Access Token
OpenAI API key (GPT-4o-mini)
Slack API credentials
Gmail OAuth2 credentials
Airtable table with tender fields (Priority, Status, Summary, Dates, etc.)

## üéØ Target Audience
Procurement teams evaluating multiple tenders
Management teams needing fast approval workflows
Business development & bidding teams
Companies tracking tenders in Airtable
Organizations adopting AI-assisted decision processes

workflow.name: Analyze high-priority tenders from Airtable to Slack for Go/No-Go approval

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "urgency": "High | Medium | Low | Review Required",
  "priorityScore": 1,
  "summary": "Short executive-ready description",
  "goNoGo": "Go | No-Go",
  "reason": "Why this priority was assigned"
}

nodes.name: AI Agent OpenAI ‚Äî RFP Summary + Scoring with JSON output

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert in procurement and tender evaluation. 
Your job is to analyze tenders and produce a priority score, clear summary, and decision recommendation.

RULES:
- Respond ONLY in valid JSON according to the schema provided
- Do NOT include any commentary outside JSON format
- Determine urgency: High / Medium / Low
- Evaluate business opportunity and risk
- If critical data like closing date is missing ‚Üí urgency = "Review Required"
- Highlight why the tender is important or risky

nodes.name: Send Tender Details and wait for response

parameters.text: There is No Priority Tender Available .

parameters.content:
## Tender Summary Generator for Management Approval 

**How it works**

This workflow evaluates high-priority tenders already stored in Airtable and prepares an executive-ready summary for management approval. AI reviews each tender‚Äôs urgency, value and risk, and generates a clean JSON report. The highest-scoring tenders are sent directly to Slack for review, where decision-makers can approve or reject in one click. Approved opportunities are instantly updated in Airtable and a confirmation email is sent to the bid team for next steps.

Tender Summary Generator for Ma‚Ä¶

**Setup steps**

Connect Airtable and set correct Base + Table for tender data

Add OpenAI and Slack credentials

Update Priority filter in Airtable search if needed

Customize Slack approval labels or messaging

Enable schedule trigger after initial test run

## üì° Trigger & Fetch Pending Tenders

Daily trigger checks Airtable for tenders marked High Priority and still Pending approval. These are routed for AI evaluation.
Nodes: Schedule Trigger ‚Üí Fetch Pending Record From Airtable

## üß† AI Analysis & Summary

Evaluates urgency, business opportunity, and risks. Produces a short management-quality summary and Go/No-Go decision in JSON.
Nodes: AI Model, AI Agent, AI Memory, Parse JSON Output, Format AI Result

## üèõ Management Approval Flow

High-value tenders are shared to Slack with Approve/Reject options. Decisions drive automated updates.
Nodes: Check Priority ‚Üí Slack Approval ‚Üí Check Approved

## üìä Status Update & Notifications

Approved tenders are marked in Airtable and emailed for action. If no qualified tenders exist, a notice is sent to Slack.
Nodes: Update Status, Send Email, Send Message (fallback)

parameters.subject: =Tender Approved: {{ $('Check Priority').item.json.TenderRefNo }} ‚Äî Proceed with Bid

parameters.content:
## üîê Credentials & Security

Store tokens securely in n8n credentials. Replace personal emails and workspace links with placeholders before publishing.

## üö® Error Handling 

 
Catches any workflow failure and posts an alert to Slack.  
Includes node name, error message, and timestamp for quick debugging.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

generic.label: Creating Error Workflows in n8n

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
